Event.name: Get_a_job
Event.definition:
<def-root>A new <fen>Employee</fen> obtains a <fen>Position</fen> with an <fen>Employer</fen>, with which there are certain <fen>Task</fen>s associated; in exchange for the performance of these <fen>Task</fen>s, the <fen>Employee</fen> receives <fen>Compensation</fen> from the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Employee">I</fex> <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Employer">with YouTube</fex> <fex name="Task">to make them a new GUI</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Compensation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing a <fen>Task</fen>.
<ex>He said he wanted to play for a contender, and then he <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Compense">for a lot of money</fex> with a team that is not a contender.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who enters an employment relation with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>In spring of 1983, <fex name="Empee">Tom</fex> <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> at the historic Wawona Hotel in Yosemite National Park, and continues to perform there nightly in the hotel's piano parlor.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person (or institution) that the <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship with.
<ex>He later played for the Scottish Claymores of the NFL Europe League in the spring of 2001, then <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Emper">with Baltimore</fex> in July of 2001.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>Van Auken <fex name="Mnr">eagerly</fex> <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> with Pennsylvania.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> enteres an employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>I had <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Place">right there</fex> with the rest of the freaks. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.
<ex> In 1973 Franco Acerbis <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Posit">as a mechanic for the Italian enduro team</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship.
<ex>Aengaela <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> with the Company <fex name="Purp">to learn the family business</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Task
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>In the end, however, Gaskill opted to remain out West and <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Task">to play Oscar Marone on CBS's The Bold and the Beautiful</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employee</fen> signs on with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>Things have been very busy with the new job since I <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Time">in June, 2001</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action by which the <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship.
<ex>After interviewing, he <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Means">with a handshake</fex> in 1988.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Contract_basis
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Contract_basis</fen> is the condition of employment with respect to permanency, hours per time period or payment arrangements.
<ex>In addition, Kellie Anngotell and Emil Fredette have <t>hired</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="cb">part-time</fex>. </ex> </def-root>
